Name: Logic and Candy
About the game: Logic and Candy - a physical puzzle game in which you have to control various blocks with the help of the mouse. The goal of the game is to throw the candy into the box, but be prepared for the fact that it is not so easy, a lot of different mechanisms will do their best to prevent it! Nice visual effects and unique levels will give you the opportunity to have a good time! Peculiarities: - Beautiful graphics; - Realistic physics; - Enjoyable gameplay.
